Sentence.sentence: Since luxury is a function of scarcity, the children of tomorrow will long for nothing more than intervals of freedom from all the blinking machines, streaming videos and scrolling headlines that leave them feeling empty and too full all at once.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: People who do not have access to a good listener may not only be denied the opportunity to heighten their self-awareness, but they are also denied valuable feedback as to the validity and acceptability of their inner thoughts and feelings.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I really can't let my mother know my true feelings
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: situations will be able to reach understanding and avoid feeling uneasy about the confrontations.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Thus, they learn early to hide vulnerable emotions such as love, joy, and sadness because they believe that such feelings are feminine and imply weakness.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It seems that men with traditional views of masculinity are more likely to suppress outward emotions and to fear emotions, supposedly because such feelings may lead to a loss of composure (镇定)
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Most young boys have been trained to believe that men who show tender feelings are considered to be feminine and weak.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: On the other hand, he says, it may just encourage people to talk more honestly about their feelings regarding race issues, which may not be such a bad thing.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: When people billed their time by ninety dollars an hour they report feeling far more priced for time.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: About one eighth of them admitted to lingering bitter feelings.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She was not feeling herself on that day.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Modern art cannot express people's true feelings.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: She said it relieved her feelings.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: An attitude is a settled way of thinking, feeling and/or behaving towards particular objects, people, events or ideologies.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Feeling both positive and negative emotions is a natural part of being human.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: I know, but there's always the feeling that if it isn't broke, don't fix it.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: In fact, by the time miss Bligh stood up to talk, I was feeling much better.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: In one experiment, people who reported feeling isolated were more likely than others to attribute desires to various gadgets.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: In those essays, and in follow-up interviews with a few of the teenagers, we found lots of insight, positive feeling and inspirational thinking.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In turn, feeling close to objects can alleviate loneliness.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Intimacy is the feeling of closeness, of connectedness with someone, of bonding.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Of the 300 employees participating in the study, those who experienced high levels of telepressure were more likely to agree with statements assessing burnout, like "I've no energy for going to work in the morning", and to report feeling fatigued and unfo
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Scan the highlights of this year's Consumer Electronics Show CES, and you may get a slight feeling of having seen them before.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Sleeping pills combine with alcohol to produce a sleepy feeling.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The amygdala is a crucial part of the brain that produces fear, anxiety and emotional responses including that sinking, guilty feeling you get when you lie.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: This inconsistency largely stems from a feeling of powerlessness.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: We may instead find ourselves feeling guilty about the time we didn't spend watching our children grow all with our loved ones, or travelling or on the cultural or leisure suits that bring us happiness.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词的共同含义是"感情"或"情感"之意。
means: emotion ： 普通用词，词义中性。泛指因外界刺激而引起思想情感从细微变化到最强烈的发作。
feeling ： 普通用词，含义广。多指具体的或内心的感受，或表露出来的强烈情感。
passion ： 指极强烈的感情、尤指愤怒、爱好等。也常指两性间的爱情。
affection ： 指对人的爱慕或深厚、温柔的感情。
sentiment ： 一般指由一种思想激起的感情，含较大的理智因素。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"感觉"之意。
means: feeling ： 最普通用词，既可指身体上的感觉，如冷暖、饥饿、疼痛等，又可指精神上的感觉，如喜、怒、哀、乐、失望等。
sensation系较严密的科学用词，指听觉、味觉、视觉、嗅觉或触觉；还可指引起激动或轰动的事物。
sense ： 主要指人或动物身体上的感觉。复数形式指人的知觉。
perception ： 侧重对外界刺激的反应和对产生感觉的物体的辨别。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"状态物品,行业等"; 2. 表介词,"在……情况下……"; 3. 表形容词,"正……的或令人……的"; 4. "……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
assume假装,假定+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.傲慢的,不逊的,僭越的
change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
correspond通信;符合+ing……的→adj.相应的,通讯的
discriminate辨别,歧视+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有辨别能力的
encourage鼓励+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.鼓舞人心的
endure持久,持续+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.持久的,不朽的
engross吸引+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.引人入胜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: exceed超出+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.非常的,极度的,胜过的,过度的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人兴奋的,使人激动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: excite使兴奋+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.令人兴奋的,使人激动的
exhilarate使高兴+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.使人兴奋的
fascinate使……入迷+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.迷人的,吸引人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flatter阿谀,奉承+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.谄媚的,讨人欢喜的,奉承的
forego居先+ing……的→adj.在前的,前述的
hard艰难+work工作+ing……的→adj.苦干的,不辞辛劳的
increase增加+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.日益增加的,增大的
inspire鼓舞+ing令人……的→inspiring灌输的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
stems_affixes.word_buile: interest使发生兴趣,引起……的注意+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有趣味的,令人好奇[或注意]的
invite邀请+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.诱人的,引人入胜的
out出+go走+ing正……的或令人……的→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
precede先于+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.在前的,前述的
promise允许,答应+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.有希望的,有前途的
refresh使清新+ing令人……的→adj.使心神爽快的
rivet铆钉,固定+ing正……的或令人……的→如铆钉一样把人钉[吸引]住→非常精彩的
threaten恐吓,威胁+ing正……的或令人……的→adj.胁迫的,危险的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 欠缺的,没有的,不够格的
stems_affixes.word_buile: want想+ing……的→想要的→欠缺的
account计算+ing状态物品,行业等→n.会计学
advertise做广告+ing行业→n.广告业;广告活动 adj.广告的;广告业务的
bank银行+ing状态物品,行业等→n.银行业
begin开始,首先+ing状态→n.开始
build建造+ing物→n.建筑[物],房屋,大楼 [同]structure
cloth布+ing物→n.服装,被褥
dance跳舞+ing状态物品,行业等→dancing舞蹈
engineer工程师+ing状态物品,行业等→n.工程[学]
feel感觉+ing状态→n.感情;心情;知觉;同情
fill填充+ing状态物品,行业等→n.充填物,馅
fish鱼+ing状态物品,行业等→n.钓鱼,捕鱼

greet问候+ing状态物品,行业等→n.祝贺,问候

change变化+ing正……的或令人……的→正在变化的
proceed进行+ing正……的或令人……的→行动,进行
age年龄+ing状态→n.成熟,变老
consider考虑+ing在……情况下……→v. 考虑,顾及,顾及,考虑到,认为; prep.鉴于,考虑到,顾及

Sentence.sentence: He's feeling positive, but he'll carry on blogging-not about eating as cheaply as you can—"there are so many people in a much worse state, with barely any money to spend on food"—but eating well on a budget.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: I can promise you this: As a result of working toward this goal, you and your children will benefit and emerge from stressful moments feeling better physically and emotionally.

Sentence.sentence: I know the feeling and here is my advice: just get it out.

Sentence.sentence: If you're in a period of change or just feeling stuck and in a rut, now may be a good time.

Sentence.sentence: In the case of Hamish Fulton, you can't help feeling that the Scottish artist has simply found a way of making his love of walking pay.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: These purchases often become more valuable with time — as stories or memories — particularly if they involve feeling more connected to others.

Sentence.sentence: This could be no more than a passing literary craze, but it also points to a broader truth about how we now approach the past: less concerned with learning from forefathers and more interested in feeling their pain.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Yet the link between feeling good and spending money on others can be seen among rich and poor people around the world, and scarcity enhances the pleasure of most things for most people.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: I've lost all feeling in my hands.
sentences.cn: 我的双手失去了知觉。

sentences.en: She had an uneasy feeling that they were still following her.
sentences.cn: 她有一种他们仍在跟踪她的感觉。

sentences.en: There seems to be a general feeling that the election will be held in June.
sentences.cn: 似乎普遍的看法是这次选举将在六月份举行。

sentences.en: She has no feeling for the suffering of others.
sentences.cn: 她对别人的痛苦没有同情心。

sentences.en: He spoke with feeling(s) about the high rate of unemployment.
sentences.cn: 他针对高失业率慷慨陈词。

sentences.en: His abrupt reply hurt our feelings.
sentences.cn: 他粗鲁的回答伤了我们的感情。

entry.def: A feeling is an emotion, such as anger or happiness.

example.ex: It gave me a feeling of satisfaction...
example.tran: 这给了我一种满足感。

example.ex: Strong feelings of pride welled up in me...
example.tran: 我心中涌起强烈的自豪感。

entry.def: Your feelings about something are the things that you think and feel about it, or your attitude towards it.

example.ex: She has strong feelings about the alleged growth in violence against female officers...
example.tran: 据称针对女警的暴力事件有所增加，她对此十分愤慨。

example.ex: I have also begun to reassess my own feelings about being a woman...
example.tran: 我也开始重新审视自己对身为女性的感受。

entry.def: When you refer to someone's feelings, you are talking about the things that might embarrass, offend, or upset them. For example, if you hurt someone's feelings, you upset them by something that you say or do.
entry.tran: (可能造成困扰、伤害或难堪的)感情

example.ex: He was afraid of hurting my feelings...
example.tran: 他怕伤了我的心。

example.ex: He has no respect, no regard for anyone's feelings...
example.tran: 他不尊重，也不顾及别人的感受。

entry.def: Feeling is a way of thinking and reacting to things which is emotional and not planned rather than logical and practical.

example.ex: He was prompted to a rare outburst of feeling.
example.tran: 他被惹得情绪非常激动，这很少见。

example.ex: ...a voice that trembles with feeling.
example.tran: 激动得发颤的声音

entry.def: Feeling for someone is love, affection, sympathy, or concern for them.

example.ex: Thomas never lost his feeling for Harriet...
example.tran: 托马斯对哈丽雅特的爱从未消逝。

example.ex: It's incredible that Peter can behave with such stupid lack of feeling.
example.tran: 彼得行事如此麻木不仁，真是难以置信。

entry.def: If you have a feeling of hunger, tiredness, or other physical sensation, you experience it.

example.ex: I also had a strange feeling in my neck...
example.tran: 我的脖子感觉也很奇怪。

example.ex: Focus on the feeling of relaxation...
example.tran: 全身心体会放松的感觉。

entry.def: Feeling in part of your body is the ability to experience the sense of touch in this part of the body.

example.ex: After the accident he had no feeling in his legs.
example.tran: 事故过后，他的腿丧失了知觉。

entry.def: If you have a feeling that something is the case or that something is going to happen, you think that is probably the case or that it is probably going to happen.

example.ex: I have a feeling that everything will come right for us one day...
example.tran: 我有种感觉，事情总有一天会变得对我们有利的。

example.ex: You have a feeling about people, and I just felt she was going to be good.
example.tran: 人总会对其他人有某种感觉，我就觉得她会是个好人。

entry.def: Feeling is used to refer to a general opinion that a group of people has about something.

example.ex: There is still some feeling in the art world that the market for such works may be declining...
example.tran: 艺术界一些人仍然认为，这类艺术品的市场可能趋于低迷。

example.ex: It seemed that anti-Fascist feeling was not being encouraged.
example.tran: 看来反法西斯情绪并未受到鼓励。

entry.def: If you have a feeling of being in a particular situation, you feel that you are in that situation.

example.ex: I had the terrible feeling of being left behind to bring up the baby while he had fun.
example.tran: 我感觉糟糕透顶，我被留下抚养孩子，而他却在寻欢作乐。

entry.def: If you have a feeling for something, you have an understanding of it or a natural ability to do it.

example.ex: Try to get a feeling for the people who live here...
example.tran: 试着去理解在这片土地上生息的人们。

example.ex: You seem to have a feeling for drawing.
example.tran: 看来你有绘画的天赋。

entry.def: If something such as a place or book creates a particular kind of feeling, it creates a particular kind of atmosphere.
entry.tran: (地方或书本营造的)气氛，氛围

example.ex: That's what we tried to portray in the book, this feeling of opulence and grandeur.
example.tran: 那就是我们在书中竭力描绘的——一种富丽堂皇的气派。

entry.def: Bad feeling or ill feeling is bitterness or anger which exists between people, for example after they have had an argument.

example.ex: There's been some bad feeling between the two families.
example.tran: 两家人之前有过节。

entry.def: Hard feelings are feelings of anger or bitterness towards someone who you have had an argument with or who has upset you. If you say 'no hard feelings', you are making an agreement with someone not to be angry or bitter about something.

example.ex: I don't want any hard feelings between our companies...
example.tran: 我不想我们两个公司间存有什么芥蒂。

example.ex: He held out his large hand. 'No hard feelings, right?'
example.tran: 他伸出大手：“不生气，对吧？”

entry.def: You say 'I know the feeling' to show that you understand or feel sorry about a problem or difficult experience that someone is telling you about.
entry.tran: 我知道那种滋味;我理解那种感受

entry.def: If you have mixed feelings about something or someone, you feel uncertain about them because you can see both good and bad points about them.

means.word_mean: 1. the experiencing of affective and emotional states;

sentences.sentence: "I disliked him and the feeling was mutual"

means.word_mean: 2. a vague idea in which some confidence is placed;

sentences.sentence: "what are your feelings about the crisis?"
"it strengthened my belief in his sincerity"
"I had a feeling that she was lying"

means.word_mean: 3. the general atmosphere of a place or situation and the effect that it has on people;

sentences.sentence: "the feel of the city excited him"
"a clergyman improved the tone of the meeting"

means.word_mean: 4. a physical sensation that you experience;

sentences.sentence: "I had a strange feeling in my leg"
"he lost all feeling in his arm"

means.word_mean: 5. the sensation produced by pressure receptors in the skin;

sentences.sentence: "she likes the touch of silk on her skin"
"he had a great feeling for music"

sentences.en: ‘I'm going to miss you. ’ ‘The feeling's mutual (= I feel exactly the same) . ’

sentences.cn: 拥抱“是亲密的标识，它会使人产生一种感觉，即：别人在你面对困难之时愿意伸出援助之手。”
sentences.en: Hugging "is a marker of intimacy and helps generate the feeling that others arethere to help in the face of difficulty."

sentences.cn: 随着时间的流逝，这些体验通常会变得更加珍贵——以记忆或故事的形式——尤 其是当它们让人感觉到自己与他人联系更紧密时。
sentences.en: These purchases often become more valuable with time — as stories or memories — particularly if they involve feeling more connected to others.

sentences.cn: 然而，全世界范围内，无论穷人还是富人中，都可以看到“将钱用到别人身上”和 “感觉更好”的联系，且对大部分人来讲，稀缺性提升了大部分事物的愉悦感。
sentences.en: Yet the link between feeling good and spending money on others can be seen among rich and poor people around the world, and scarcity enhances the pleasure of most things for most people.

sentences.cn: 这种矛盾在很大程度上源于一种无能为力的感觉。

sentences.en: In fact, constructively expressing other negative feeling can be a very positive, empowering act.

sentences.en: It's best to yield to your grief for a time, then you will be able to deal with your feelings.

sentences.en: You also supposed to use them to show the emotion you are feeling.

sentences.en: Each day, I would glide in and out of a variety of feelings.

sentences.cn: 他讨厌谈他的感情。
sentences.en: He hates talking about his feelings.

sentences.cn: 我不是故意伤害你的感情。
sentences.en: I didn't mean to hurt your feelings (= offend you) .

sentences.cn: 根据一种经典的情感理沦，我们的部分感情来自于身体反应。
sentences.en: According to one classical theory of emotion, our feelings are partially rooted in physical reactions.

sentences.cn: 她们把自己的感情、希望和小小的伤心事用一大堆漂亮话掩藏起来.
sentences.en: And conceal all their feelings and desires and little heartbreaks behind a lot of sweet words.

sentences.cn: 他们很少关心人民的要求,人民的感情和愿望.
sentences.en: These leaders pay little attention on what the people desire what are their feelings and aspirations.

sentences.cn: 他顾虑到他人的感情.
sentences.en: He is regardful of the feelings of other persons.

sentences.cn: 一个人要抑制自己的感情是不容易的.
sentences.en: It's hard to dam up one's feelings.

sentences.cn: 我说那话时, 没考虑到她的感情.
sentences.en: When I said that, I was not thinking of her feelings.

sentences.cn: 我的个人的感情歪曲了我对这个事件的判断.
sentences.en: My personal feelings color my judgment in this case.

sentences.cn: 一种用来抒发作者感情或思想的短诗.
sentences.en: A poem a short one, that expresses a speaker's personal thoughts or feelings.

sentences.cn: 他无法把自己的感情用言语说清楚.
sentences.en: He couldn't put his feelings into words, ie express them verbally.

sentences.cn: 文法中,感叹语是用来表达一种强烈感情的单词或短语.
sentences.en: In grammar , an interjection is a word or a phrase used to express a strong feeling.

sentences.en: He tried to disguise his real feelings.

sentences.cn: 他玩弄了简的感情.
sentences.en: He has sported with Jane's feelings.

sentences.cn: 需要承认这种感情的存在,仅仅这样就能使我们把这些感情置之脑后了吗.
sentences.en: These feelings need to be acknowledged and only then can we put them behind us.

sentences.cn: 我不知道该怎样去解释我们之间的关系和感情, 一切来得如此不可思议.
sentences.en: I wonder how to explain the feelings and relationship between us. All comes like a miracle.

sentences.cn: 每当白羊座想要表现风趣的时候, 他们有时就会伤到别人的感情.
sentences.en: When Aries people are trying to be funny, they sometimes hurt people's feelings.

sentences.cn: 情感和感情被隐藏 、 被压抑会导致胃炎 、 胃溃疡 、 腰腿痛 、 脊椎病.

sentences.cn: 他的朗诵抑扬顿挫,富有感情.
sentences.en: His recitation was cadenced and rich in feeling.

sentences.cn: 但其中却有大量不合常理的感情牵涉在里边, 类似于麻瓜世界的种族状况.
sentences.en: Nonetheless, there are plenty of irrational feelings involved, which resemble the racism found in Muggle societies.

sentences.cn: 虽然我对你有太多太多的无语, 也有很复杂的感情.
sentences.en: Although I have you have too much of nothing, also very complicated feelings.

sentences.cn: 我有一个严格把握的感情,让他窒息您.

sentences.en: Emotional outbursts are also possible, especially if you've been feeling especially constrained or stressed.

sentences.en: Whatever happens, you have to dam up your feelings.

sentences.en: Foreigners are also feeling the heat.

sentences.en: There is a weird feeling about the place.

sentences.en: She stopped midway between the table and the fire, feeling the tension the room.

sentences.en: There's a general feeling of cheer as the holiday season nears.

sentences.en: Don't eat salad because cucumbers have feelings?

sentences.cn: 艺术界一些人仍然认为，这类艺术品的市场可能趋于低迷。
sentences.en: There is still some feeling in the art world that the market for such works may be declining...

sentences.cn: 总的来说，人们认为自己付出的行动和努力，而不是外界力量，是生活如何发展的决定因素。但是对于怎样做才能在当前的经济形势下过上更好的生活，受访者百感交集。
sentences.en: By and large, people felt that their actions and hard work—not outside forces—were the deciding factor in how their lives turned out. But respondents had decidedly mixed feelings about what actions make for a better life in the current economy.

sentences.en: But it cannot be considered " irrational " merely because no reason can be given for feeling it.

sentences.cn: 四分之三的人认为,假如是为了不伤害某人的感情,撒谎是可以的.
sentences.en: Three quarters of those surveyed believe it alright to fib if it's to save someone's feelings.

sentences.cn: 不要认为自己必须顺应潮流–因为这是差异化的最大杀手.

sentences.cn: 泰瑞说,她认为这件事处理过程完全未经思考,也没有考虑她的感受.

sentences.en: I think she hurt my feelings deliberately rather than by accident as she claimed.

sentences.en: George feels people won't necessarily like it because of that, but my feeling is the reverse.

sentences.en: He thought I was wrong and said so. I bear him no hard feelings for that.
